Params: {1: '1', 3: "So long as the boat doesn't founder on a rock or hit a storm... or meet a dragon, we'll make it to the port in less than a day.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'The tall, strong sailor keeps watch all night. The look on his wrinkled face shows no fatigue. He stands on one side of the boat and looks into the distance.'}
{2: "I thought we wouldn't run into a dragon at sea.", 3: '7'}
{3: 'It is less likely than running into a dragon on land, but it is still possible.', 4: '1'}
{3: "Above the deck, some seagulls fly low. The morning mist hasn't faded, and the children are still sleeping soundly."}
{3: 'The captain operates a rod and commands the helmsman to steer in another direction.'}
{3: 'The sailors look lively as they become vigilant.'}
{3: 'Once we make it across this sea, we will arrive at our final destination.'}
